channel.title: oracle on 青丝蘸白雪i
channel.description: Recent content in oracle on 青丝蘸白雪i

item.title: 常用sql语句记录
item.description: 批量修改A表中数据在B表中的映射数据 UPDATE tableA a LEFT JOIN tableB b on a.Aid=b.Bid set a.codeA=b.codeB 在oracle中语句如下 UPDATE tableA SET tableA.codeA = ( SELECT tableB.codeB FROM tableB WHERE tableA.Aid = tableB.Bid );
